name: Approval Reminder
description: Sent to approvers who have not reviewed an assigned approval request after an admin-configured amount of time.
subject: Reminder: An Approval Request Is Awaiting Your Review
body:
Dear ${__recipient.name},

This is a reminder that an approval request for $approvalName submitted by #if($requestee.name && $requestee.name != '') $requester.name for $requestee.name #else $requester.name #end is pending your reviewal.

To review approval requests that are assigned to you, please go to: $__global.productUrl/ui/d/$approverPath


Thank you,
The ${__global.productName} Team
